comments:
Build ID: M20060629-1905

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Close any PHP file.
2. An Error popup displays: An error has occurred. See error log for more details.
3.


More information:
I have other issues too, and I will state them here maybe they're related:

When I open a PHP Project, I get a popup that says: 
opening project...: updating duplicate resource: [project_name]

A second issue is about the PHP Parser: 
When I right click on a PHP Project, select Properties, then choose Builders, in the right pane I see: 
Missing builder: net.sourceforge.phpeclipse.parserbuilder
that I cannot edit too!!

Did Eclipse name it: Missing builder because of a missing file ? If yes, then why did that happen ? 
Note that I installed Eclipse IDE with PHP Plugin from: 

http://download.eclipse.org/tools/php/downloads/index.php?release=S20061026-M3
